00031 TBTrackTdcHitsCheck::TBTrackTdcHitsCheck() :
00032   TBTrackBaseProcessor("TBTrackTdcHitsCheck") {
00033 
00034   _description = "TBTrackTdcHitsCheck" ;
00035 
00036   _cern=true;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void TBTrackTdcHitsCheck::initHists(bool real) {
00040 
00041   std::string sxy[2]={"X","Y"};
00042   std::string sly[4]={"Layer0","Layer1","Layer2","Layer3"};
00043 
00044   if(real) {
00045     hNCol=new TH1F("NCol","Number of hit objects",9,0.0,9.0);
00046     hNEnt=new TH1F("NEnt","Number of events with hit object 4*XY+Layer",8,0.0,8.0);
00047     
00048     for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00049       for(unsigned layer(0);layer<4;layer++) {
00050         hNumb[xy][layer]=new TH1F((sxy[xy]+sly[layer]+"Numb").c_str(),
00051                                   (sxy[xy]+" "+sly[layer]+": Number of hits").c_str(),
00052                                   100,0.0,100.0);
00053         if(_cern) {
00054           hDist[xy][layer]=new TH1F((sxy[xy]+sly[layer]+"Dist").c_str(),
00055                                     (sxy[xy]+" "+sly[layer]+": Hit distribution").c_str(),
00056                                     200,-1000.0,1000.0);
00057         } else {
00058           hDist[xy][layer]=new TH1F((sxy[xy]+sly[layer]+"Dist").c_str(),
00059                                     (sxy[xy]+" "+sly[layer]+": Hit distribution").c_str(),
00060                                     300,0.0,3000.0);
00061         }
00062         hSepr[xy][layer]=new TH1F((sxy[xy]+sly[layer]+"Sepr").c_str(),
00063                                   (sxy[xy]+" "+sly[layer]+": Hit separation").c_str(),
00064                                   100,0.0,1000.0);
00065       }
00066       
00067       unsigned n(0);
00068       for(unsigned layerA(0);layerA<3;layerA++) {
00069         for(unsigned layerB(layerA+1);layerB<4;layerB++) {
00070           if((layerA==0 && layerB==2) ||
00071              (layerA==1 && layerB==3)) {
00072             hLpmL[xy][n]=new TH1F((sxy[xy]+sly[layerB]+"Ms"+sly[layerA]).c_str(),
00073                                   (sxy[xy]+" "+sly[layerB]+" - "+sly[layerA]+
00074                                    ": Hit distribution").c_str(),
00075                                   100,-500.0,500.0);
00076           } else {
00077             hLpmL[xy][n]=new TH1F((sxy[xy]+sly[layerB]+"Ps"+sly[layerA]).c_str(),
00078                                   (sxy[xy]+" "+sly[layerB]+" + "+sly[layerA]+
00079                                    ": Hit distribution").c_str(),
00080                                   100,1900.0,2900.0);
00081           }
00082           
00083           hLvsL[xy][n]=new TH2F((sxy[xy]+sly[layerB]+"Vs"+sly[layerA]).c_str(),
00084                                 (sxy[xy]+" "+sly[layerB]+" vs "+sly[layerA]+
00085                                  ": Hit distributions").c_str(),
00086                                 100,800.0,1800.0,100,800.0,1800.0);
00087           n++;
00088         }
00089       }
00090     }
00091 
00092 
00093   } else {
00094     for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00095       for(unsigned layer(0);layer<4;layer++) {
00096         hDiff[xy][layer]=new TH1F((sxy[xy]+sly[layer]+"Diff").c_str(),
00097                                   (sxy[xy]+" "+sly[layer]+": Difference of hit and MC hit").c_str(),
00098                                   100,-2.0,2.0);
00099       }
00100     }
00101   }
00102 }
00103 
00104 void TBTrackTdcHitsCheck::Init() {
00105 }
00106 
00107 void TBTrackTdcHitsCheck::ProcessRunHeader( LCRunHeader* run) {
00108   closeHFile();
00109   openHFile(run);
00110   initHists(true);
00111   initHists(false);
00112 }
00113 
00114 void TBTrackTdcHitsCheck::ProcessEvent( LCEvent * evt ) {
00115 
00116 
00117   if(printLevel(3)) {
00118     std::cout << "Collections in the event" << std::endl;
00119 
00120     typedef const std::vector<std::string> StringVec ;
00121     StringVec* strVec = evt->getCollectionNames() ;
00122     
00123     for( StringVec::const_iterator name = strVec->begin() ; name != strVec->end() ; name++) {
00124       std::string sss = name->c_str();
00125       LCCollection* col = evt->getCollection(*name);
00126       int nHits =  col->getNumberOfElements() ;
00127       
00128       std::cout << "----> Evt " <<evt->getEventNumber()<< ", EXISTING COLLECTION, of the class : "
00129            << col->getTypeName().c_str() << " and named : " << sss << " with " << nHits << " elements." << std::endl;
00130     }
00131   }
00132 
00133   const LCIntVec *p[2][4]={{0,0,0,0},{0,0,0,0}};
00134 
00135   const LCCollection* col(0);
00136   col=getCollection(evt, "TBTrackTdcHits", LCIO::LCINTVEC);
00137   if(col!=0) {
00138     if(printLevel(2)) std::cout << "Number of elements in collection = "
00139                                 << col->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
00140     
00141     assert(col->getNumberOfElements()>=0);
00142     assert(col->getNumberOfElements()<=8);
00143 
00144     hNCol->Fill(col->getNumberOfElements());
00145 
00146     for(int i(0);i<col->getNumberOfElements();i++) {
00147       const LCIntVec *q(dynamic_cast<const LCIntVec*>(col->getElementAt(i)));
00148       assert(q!=0);
00149 
00150       // Make it a reference for convenience
00151       const LCIntVec &v(*q);
00152 
00153       if(printLevel(2)) {
00154         std::cout << "Element " << i << " size = "
00155                   << v.size() <<std::endl;
00156         for(unsigned j(0);j<v.size();j++) {
00157           if(printLevel(3)) {
00158             std::cout << " Value " << j << " = " << v[j] << std::endl;
00159           }
00160         }
00161       }
00162 
00163       // If it exists, it should have at least one hit
00164       assert(v.size()>=1);
00165 
00166       // Check xy and layer values
00167       assert(v[0]<8);
00168       unsigned xy(v[0]&1);
00169       unsigned layer(v[0]>>1);
00170 
00171       // Check the same xy/layer combination has not already appeared
00172       assert(p[xy][layer]==0);
00173       p[xy][layer]=q;
00174 
00175       // Fill histograms
00176       hNEnt->Fill(v[0]);
00177       hNumb[xy][layer]->Fill(v.size()-2);
00178 
00179       int previous(0);
00180       for(unsigned j(1);j<v.size();j++) {
00181         hDist[xy][layer]->Fill(v[j]);
00182 
00183         if(j>1) hSepr[xy][layer]->Fill(v[j]-previous);
00184         previous=v[j];
00185       }
00186     }
00187 
00188     for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00189       unsigned n(0);
00190       for(unsigned layerA(0);layerA<3;layerA++) {
00191         if(p[xy][layerA]!=0) {
00192           const LCIntVec &vA(*(p[xy][layerA]));
00193 
00194           for(unsigned layerB(layerA+1);layerB<4;layerB++) {
00195             if(p[xy][layerB]!=0) {
00196               const LCIntVec &vB(*(p[xy][layerB]));
00197 
00198               for(unsigned j(1);j<vA.size();j++) {
00199                 for(unsigned k(1);k<vB.size();k++) {
00200                   if((layerA==0 && layerB==2) ||
00201                      (layerA==1 && layerB==3)) {
00202                     hLpmL[xy][n]->Fill(vB[j]-vA[k]);
00203                   } else {
00204                     hLpmL[xy][n]->Fill(vB[j]+vA[k]);
00205                   }
00206                   hLvsL[xy][n]->Fill(vA[j],vB[k]);
00207                 }
00208               }
00209 
00210               n++;
00211             }
00212           }
00213         }
00214       }
00215     }
00216   }             
00217 
00218   if(_runInformation.isMC()) {
00219     col=getCollection(evt,"MCParticle",LCIO::MCPARTICLE);
00220     if(col!=0) {
00221       if(col->getNumberOfElements()>0) {
00222         const MCParticle *m(dynamic_cast<const MCParticle*>(col->getElementAt(0)));
00223         
00224         if(printLevel(2)) {
00225           std::cout << "Original MCParticle found "
00226                     << std::setw(6) << m->getPDG()
00227                     << std::setw(13) << m->getVertex()[0]
00228                     << std::setw(13) << m->getVertex()[1]
00229                     << std::setw(13) << m->getVertex()[2]
00230                     << std::setw(13) << 0.0
00231                     << std::setw(13) << m->getTime()
00232                     << std::setw(13) << 1000.0*m->getMomentum()[0] // In GeV!
00233                     << std::setw(13) << 1000.0*m->getMomentum()[1]
00234                     << std::setw(13) << 1000.0*m->getMomentum()[2] << std::endl;
00235         }
00236         
00237         for(int l(0);l<4;l++) {
00238           if(l==0) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdch02_dchSD2",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00239           if(l==1) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdch02_dchSD1",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00240           if(l==2) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdch02_dchSD3",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00241           if(l==3) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdch02_dchSD4",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00242 
00243           for(unsigned xy(0);xy<2;xy++) {
00244             /*
00245             if(l==0 && xy==0) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdchX02_dchSDx1",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00246             if(l==1 && xy==0) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdchX02_dchSDx2",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00247             if(l==2 && xy==0) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdchX02_dchSDx3",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00248             if(l==3 && xy==0) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdchX02_dchSDx4",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00249             if(l==0 && xy==1) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdchY02_dchSDy1",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00250             if(l==1 && xy==1) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdchY02_dchSDy2",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00251             if(l==2 && xy==1) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdchY02_dchSDy3",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00252             if(l==3 && xy==1) col=getCollection(evt,"TBdchY02_dchSDy4",LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT);
00253             */
00254             
00255             if(col!=0) {
00256               bool found(false);
00257               double c(0.0);
00258               
00259               for(int i(0);i<col->getNumberOfElements();i++) {
00260                 const SimTrackerHit *p(dynamic_cast<const SimTrackerHit*>(col->getElementAt(i)));
00261                 assert(p!=0);
00262                 //assert(p->getCellID()==2*l+xy);
00263                 
00264                 if(printLevel(2)) {
00265                   std::cout << "SimTrackerHit " << l << std::setw(4) << i << " found "
00266                             << std::setw(6)           << p->getCellID()
00267                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getPosition()[0]
00268                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getPosition()[1]
00269                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getPosition()[2]
00270                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getdEdx()
00271                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getTime()
00272                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getMomentum()[0]
00273                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getMomentum()[1]
00274                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getMomentum()[2]
00275                             << std::setw(13)          << p->getPathLength() << std::endl;
00276                 }
00277                 
00278                 if(p->getMomentum()[2]>900.0*m->getMomentum()[2]) {
00279                   double zLo(p->getPosition()[2]+813.0);
00280                   double zHi(p->getPosition()[2]+p->getPathLength()+813.0);
00281                   if(zLo<_fitConstants.zLayer(xy,l) && zHi>_fitConstants.zLayer(xy,l)) {
00282                     c=p->getPosition()[xy];
00283                     found=true;
00284                   }
00285                 }
00286               }
00287               
00288               if(found) {
00289                 if(printLevel(2)) {
00290                   std::cout << "SimTrackerHit average position = " << c << std::endl;
00291                 }
00292                 
00293                 if(p[xy][l]!=0) {
00294                   const LCIntVec &v(*(p[xy][l]));
00295                   for(unsigned j(1);j<v.size();j++) {
00296                     if(printLevel(3)) {
00297                       std::cout << "TDC hit position " << std::setw(13) << _simConstants.coordinate(xy,l,v[j]) << std::endl;
00298                     }
00299                     hDiff[xy][l]->Fill(c-_simConstants.coordinate(xy,l,v[j]));
00300                   }               
00301                 }
00302               }
00303             }
00304           }
00305         }
00306       }
00307     }
00308   }
00309 }

00312 void TBTrackTdcHitsCheck::End() {
00313   closeHFile();
00314 }
